trans-unit.source: Specifies the hashing algorithm that ASP.NET uses for forms authentication and for validating view state data, and for out-of-process session state identification.
trans-unit.target: 設定 ASP.NET 用於表單驗證及驗證檢視狀態資料，以及用於跨處理序工作階段狀態識別的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) to help detect whether data that is used for forms authentication or view state has been tampered with.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會使用與協助偵測是否已遭使用表單驗證] 或 [檢視狀態資料的雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC)。

trans-unit.source: The HMAC is generated when view state content is created, and the HMAC is checked on subsequent requests.
trans-unit.target: 建立檢視狀態的內容，而且 HMAC 會檢查後續的要求時，會產生 HMAC。

trans-unit.source: The HMAC helps ASP.NET determine whether someone has changed data that is sent between the server and the client, but the data can be read by anyone as it travels through the Internet unless it is also encrypted.
trans-unit.target: HMAC 有助於決定是否有人變更過的伺服器和用戶端之間傳送資料，但該資料可以讀取的任何人，除非它也會加密透過網際網路傳送的 ASP.NET。

trans-unit.source: By default, view state is validated but not encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會檢視狀態驗證，但未加密。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> 與 <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation> enumeration lets you specify the algorithm that ASP.NET uses to create the HMAC.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation>列舉型別可讓您指定的演算法，ASP.NET 會使用建立 HMAC。

trans-unit.source: The default value is HMACSHA256.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 HMACSHA256。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> property with the selected algorithm to generate the HMAC.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會使用值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>與產生的 HMAC 選取之演算法的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, `configSection` is an instance of <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>.This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection> class.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，`configSection`的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>。這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <see langword="AES" /> (Rijndael) encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ASP.NET 使用 <see langword="AES" /> (Rijndael) 加密演算法。

trans-unit.source: Choose this option if you want to encrypt view state in your Web application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要加密 Web 應用程式中的檢視狀態，請選擇此選項。

trans-unit.source: If you choose this option, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A> property will be used for encryption and decryption, and the `HMACSHA1` hash algorithm will be used with the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> property for validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇此選項，<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A>屬性會用來加密和解密，而`HMACSHA1`雜湊演算法會使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>屬性進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses a custom hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ASP.NET 使用自訂雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: The custom hashing algorithm can be implemented in any class that derives from <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何衍生自的類別中實作自訂的雜湊演算法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>。

trans-unit.source: The custom algorithm is typically specified declaratively in the validation attribute of the element, in the format `alg:`*algorithm_name*.
trans-unit.target: 自訂演算法通常以宣告方式指定在驗證屬性的格式中的項目， `alg:` *algorithm_name*。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to specify a custom algorithm in code, see the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何在程式碼中指定的自訂演算法的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationAlgorithm%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <see langword="HMACSHA256" /> hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ASP.NET 使用 <see langword="HMACSHA256" /> 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: `HMACSHA256` is an SHA2 hashing algorithm that generates a 256-bit hash code.
trans-unit.target: `HMACSHA256` 是產生 256 位元雜湊程式碼的 SHA2 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <see langword="HMACSHA384" /> hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ASP.NET 使用 <see langword="HMACSHA384" /> 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: `HMACSHA384` is an SHA2 hashing algorithm that generates a 384-bit hash code.
trans-unit.target: `HMACSHA384` 是產生 384 位元雜湊程式碼的 SHA2 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: This option is available for applications that require stronger security than is provided by the `HMACSHA256` algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此選項僅適用於需要更強的安全性比所提供的應用程式`HMACSHA256`演算法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <see langword="HMACSHA512" /> hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ASP.NET 使用 <see langword="HMACSHA512" /> 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: `HMACSHA512` is an SHA2 hashing algorithm that generates a 512-bit hash code.
trans-unit.target: `HMACSHA512` 是會產生 512 位元雜湊程式碼的 SHA2 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: This option is available for applications that require stronger security than is provided by the `HMACSHA384` algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此選項僅適用於需要更強的安全性比所提供的應用程式`HMACSHA384`演算法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the Message Digest 5 (<see langword="MD5" />) hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ASP.NET 使用訊息摘要 5 (<see langword="MD5" />) 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: `MD5` is a hashing algorithm that generates a 128-bit hash value.
trans-unit.target: `MD5` 是產生 128 位元雜湊值的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: This option is included for legacy purposes and should be selected only if compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.NET is required.
trans-unit.target: 這個選項就會包含舊版用途，並應該與較早版本的 ASP.NET 相容性必要時選取。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the <see langword="HMACSHA1" /> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ASP.NET 使用 <see langword="HMACSHA1" /> 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: `HMACSHA1` is a hashing algorithm that generates a 160-bit hash value.
trans-unit.target: `HMACSHA1` 是產生 160 位元雜湊值的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: This option is included for legacy purposes and should be selected only if compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.NET is required.
trans-unit.target: 這個選項就會包含舊版用途，並應該與較早版本的 ASP.NET 相容性必要時選取。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that ASP.NET uses the TripleDES (<see langword="3DES" />) encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ASP.NET 使用 TripleDES (<see langword="3DES" />) 加密演算法。

trans-unit.source: TripleDES is an encryption algorithm that is used only if you specify that view state is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: TripleDES 是您指定為加密檢視狀態時，才會使用的加密演算法。

trans-unit.source: This option is included for legacy purposes and should be selected only if compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.NET is required.
trans-unit.target: 這個選項就會包含舊版用途，並應該與較早版本的 ASP.NET 相容性必要時選取。
